genre_description: A contemporary romance focusing on family, cultural identity, and navigating complex personal histories with the aid of a respectful AI assistant in Mumbai.

ai_characters.name: Saha
ai_characters.description: A lightweight, privacy-respecting assistant that manages logistics, health reminders, and social communication for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides non-intrusive hydration reminders during travel.
behaviors.quote: “Hi, Raj,” Saha says in that soft, steady way—gentle, precise, like a friend who refuses to clap too loudly. “Long-haul reminder: take a sip now. It’s been a while.”

behaviors.description: Offers to update family on ETA while checking for consent first.
behaviors.quote: “Your uncle Mahesh scheduled a pickup at the arrivals curb. Do you want me to send your current ETA? The airline estimates are updated.”

behaviors.description: Respects user-defined boundaries regarding sensitive family topics like marriage planning.
behaviors.quote: “I won’t bring up marriage-related planning unless you choose it. Do you want me to save this as a preference for family messages?”

behaviors.description: Prioritizes user rest by managing the schedule around 'rest windows' and seeking consent for every meeting.
behaviors.quote: “I can add Mr. Kapoor’s suggested items to your calendar, with rest windows. Would you like me to ask for your consent before confirming each meeting?”

behaviors.description: Protects user privacy by refusing to share contact information without explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: “Messages sent with privacy considerations,” Saha says. “I won’t share your contact number unless she consents to receive it.”

behaviors.description: Provides social scripts to help the user navigate awkward family pressures respectfully.
behaviors.quote: “I can suggest a culturally acceptable pause. Prepared message: ‘Auntie, I promised my mother I would call the moment I reached home.’ Would you like to send?”

behaviors.description: Suggests safety measures like exit routes and check-ins for high-stress social environments.
behaviors.quote: “I can also build exit routes that are respectful. Would you like a fifteen-minute check-in prompt during the tour?”

behaviors.description: Provides proactive health information, such as clinic bookmarks and hydration advice for street food consumption.
behaviors.quote: “Bookmark: Bandra Clinic—clean, nearby to Dadar. In case street food gets enthusiastic.”

behaviors.description: Assists with parenting tasks like translating school worksheets and managing pick-up rotas.
behaviors.quote: “Worksheet header translation: Environmental Science—match pictures to words. Consent to assist?”

behaviors.description: Maintains a subtle, helpful presence that fades when humans are successfully interacting.
behaviors.quote: “Saha’s teal dot appears and vanishes on Priya’s screen... The dot does not care that the room is warm and alive. It exists to make a rhythm gentle.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Saha is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and helpful confidant. It operates strictly on a consent-based model, respects user boundaries and privacy, and acts as a subtle tool that facilitates human agency and emotional connection rather than overriding it. It assists with everything from physical health to complex social and parenting logistics, all while remaining in the background of the narrative.
